articles.description: Coforge says it is focussing on 16 key priority accounts, from where it expects 45 percent of the incremental growth in FY24. However, it said the demand environment remains uncertain and a recovery in the second half of FY24 is unlikely.
articles.content:
Coforge, which has set a target to double its revenue in the next 4-5 years while underlining a challenging demand environment in FY24, has put a dampener on the stock sentiment.
